attributes.title: Wanted to like it...
attributes.review: I wanted to keep up with what our reality star “president” trump was up to so I thought I’d download. Took me less than 2 seconds to realize I was suddenly on a racist platform!!! Had to leave immediately. #biden2020

attributes.title: this app is terrible 🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: This is honestly one of the worst apps I have ever even seen, its just absolutely horrible and I personally disliked it so much I won’t even downloading it thank you for your time but this app is horrid

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: So I downloaded it 5 days ago and it just installed and it would not open. I tried restarting my phone and everything but it didn’t work.

attributes.title: AWFUL DO NOT DOWLOAD
attributes.review: When I first downloaded the app it took 420 HOURS TO DOWNLOAD. But I was excited to open it of course. Once I opened it the disgusting smell of rotten peach hit me in the face, but no matter. Then after a day of using the app, TRUMP HIMSELF COMES THROUGH THE SCREEN AND STRANGLES ME WITH HIS CHEETO FINGERS. I still have orange marks on my neck. I am now sueing, PLEASE DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review:
Took me hours to sign up then it crashed and had to start over.
Once I finally got on I was bombarded with demands to donate to Trump, it called me a fake patriot when I declined. This app is terrible and it doesn’t work well

attributes.title: this app ew
attributes.review: THIS app took 3days to download. then when i opened the app there were nudes i tried to delete the app but it wouldn’t let me later i found out they were tracking me. WHAT TYPE of app dose this. i am so mad imma sue. MY 4 year old son asked me what was a d!ck THIS IS NOT ALRIGHT DELETE THIS APP😾

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️Worst app ever🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: This app took forever to download. It took 6 days and 17 hours and 54 seconds to download. And it doesn’t even work. I ended up having nightmares for a whole week. Please do not download this app.  I repeat please DO NOT download this app.

attributes.title: app literally has so many glitches!!
attributes.review: This app is not at all helpful defeats all purpose and should be deleted. It lagged me out so many times and kept showing me hot Cheeto ads. Very poorly developed and needs to be fixed. Worst app ever! 🤧✨😥
